summary:
So TweakTeam got a request to upgrade Mjoll...
<br />Thaaaat went not so well, so we made a new NPC.
<br />Her sister, Mila.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=turquoise]So TweakTeam got a request to upgrade Mjoll...
Thaaaat went not so well, so we made a new NPC.
Her sister, Mila. Includes vanilla hair option.[/color]

[color=pink]She, like her sister, is a strong nord woman, although not very brave.
She is skilled in 1-handed, 2-handed, and archery
She will use the best armor you give her, as usual.
She has a steel greatsword and draugr armor by default.
[/color]

[color=turquoise]Perks:
Tower of Strength
Champions stance
Deep wounds (1)
Skullcrusher (1)
Limbsplitter (1)
Armsman (3)
OverDraw (3)
TwoHanded is a little higher than other skills for her[/color]

[color=pink]She should be marrigeable, and
has a relationship status of
lover towards the player.[/color]

[color=turquoise]Requirements:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] for the main version
You also need Realistic teeth, according to the creator of this mod. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Legit Skyrim (TweakTeam does [b]NOT[/b] endorse piratism, just as the nexus!)[/color]

[color=pink]Credits:
XBitu for doing all the work
Apachii for SkyHair
Bethesda for Skyrim and CK
You for checking this mod out
Me for uploading and being a B055[/color]

[color=turquoise]Permissions:
Go nuts! Remember to credit the same persons we credited![/color]

[color=pink]#TweakTeam takes requests for: Small tweaks! Big tweaks!
NPCs! And [i]**drumroll**[/i] IT'S 100% FREE[/color][/size]

A side note: XBitu will be gone for this weekend, workpace is a little slower as a result.
Î”
author: TweakTeam
